recipe_name: Bruschetta with fresh cherry tomatoes and basil
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Drizzle the cut side of the ciabatta bread with one tablespoon of the olive oil and toast in a large, non-stick frying pan until golden-brown. Mix the remaining tablespoon of olive oil, cherry tomatoes, basil and salt and pepper in a small bowl and leave aside to infuse. To serve, divide the tomato mixture between the two pieces of toasted ciabatta bread.
